snippet: Kenneth Bae, 45, a tour operator who was sentenced to 15 years of hard labor, has left the camp where he was being held. His health has declined, his sister said.
abstract: Kenneth Bae, American tour operator imprisoned in North Korea, has been moved from a labor camp to a hospital in the capital of Pyongyang.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth Bae, 45, a tour operator who was sentenced to 15 years of hard labor, has left the camp where he was being held. His health has declined, his sister said.

headline.main: American Is Moved to North Korean Hospital
headline.print_headline: American Is Moved to North Korea Hospital
